entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Chevery
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:10 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chevery 6:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -13.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -17.0°C
Wind: WSW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 50 gusting to 70 late in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
